page.title: 13Education. Comprehensive
page.content: Work began on extending St. Kingsmark school in 1982.The school will be completed by July 1986.On average there will be 70 teachers and between 1,000 and 1,100 children in the school on completion.The completed school will be called{Chepstow Comprehensive. The uniform will be former Kingsmark uniform but the sixth form will have the old Larkfield uniform.The children and the teachers are looking forward to being under one roof and sharing the Community centre.There are enough subjects on the time table at present so no more new subjects can be introduced.
